description.en:
1. Yakusoku Breaker (約束プレイカー) 
2. Majimena Aitsu ni Aniken no Ore ga Oshiete Yareru Koto (マジメな後輩にアニ研の俺が 教えてやれるコト) 
3. Majimena Aitsu ni Aniken no Ore ga Oshiete Yareru Koto 2 (マジメな後輩にアニ研の俺が 教えてやれるコト 2) 
4. HolyBell
Kai expects to spend another Christmas alone and by himself, but a Christmas miracle shows up in the form of his little sister’s friend, a seemingly shy and demure girl named Suzu.
5. Tsuyudaku (COMIC BAVEL 2015-10) 
6. Ecchi Shiyo (COMIC Europa 2015-05) (うそつき侵略者) 
7. Gankake (COMIC Europa 2015-03) (ガンカケ) 
8. The Love Song of the Nightingale (ナイチンゲール の 恋歌) 
9. Binetsu summer - summer of slight fever (微熱Summer) 
10. Houkago Secret (放課後シークレット) 
11. Katakoi Irony (COMIC Europa 2014-11) (片恋アイロニー) 
12. Kataguruma x Shoujo (COMIC L.Q.M ~Little Queen Mount~ Vol. 3) (日車×少女)
